content.rendered:
Seaweed and spirulina packed with phytonutrients and marine minerals detoxify and revitalise skin for a rich, once-a-week treatment packed with shea butter, jojoba, macadamia, rosewood, and three types of clay, to moisturise, firm, strengthen, and refine.

Australian yellow and white clays blended with ultrafine zeolite clay provide a powerful detoxifying action to clarify and brighten the skin. It’s the perfect ‘date night’ mask!

 

Suitable for all skin types.

excerpt.rendered: A facial in a jar! A powerfully detoxifying and firming mask this glow-inducing vitamin-and-mineral-packed treatment plumps and brightens skin, and balances skin tone.
